dict.acceptation: 抱负；渴望得到的东西；追求的目标；夙愿；

sent.orig: And there was an ambition in him which responded to that, an ambition he distrusted.
sent.trans: 他内心也不是没有奢望，看到这种前途也不是没有动过心，不过对这种奢望总有些不以为然。

sent.orig: Usually, a successful person always has a wild ambition.
sent.trans: 通常一个成功的人往往是拥有一定“野心”的。

sent.orig: The main qualities required are preparedness to work hard, ability to learn, ambition and good health.
sent.trans: 主要必备素质是吃苦耐劳精神好、学习能力优、事业心强和身体棒。

sent.orig: They will never be allowed to attain their ambition.
sent.trans: 绝不能让他的野心得逞。
